description: Quick Contacts Lite is the Free Version of the ultimate speed dialing application for your Palm Pre and Palm Pixi - Quick Contacts!  With Quick Contacts Lite, you can call, SMS and email all of your favorite contacts by just tapping on their photo and never even slide open your keyboard. It also has it's own QuickLaunch bar with your favorite Quicklaunch Buttons - Contacts, SMS, Email and Phone Dialer so you can make room on your phone's QuickLaunch bar. That will let you get to everything quickly and easily. Once you start using Quick Contacts Lite, you'll wonder what took you so long.  * Unlike the full version, Quick Contacts Lite is limited to a maximum of 9 contacts, does not have custom backgrounds and cannot do Dialing Prefixes and Suffixes (to dial Google Voice, calling cards and phone extensions). * Newest version fixes earlier issues with stretched photos
